other_tests.findings: Interpreted as metastatic melanoma, although no skin melanoma was found.
Results were normal, suggesting no recurrence of previous cardiac myxoma.

other_tests.procedure_name: Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) of the pituitary

other_tests.findings: Showed a nodular goiter (thyroid volume 32 mL).
Initiated after hormonal analysis revealed elevated IGF-1 and nonsuppressed GH.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Led to normalization of GH, prolactin, and IGF-1 after surgery.

other_tests.findings: 1-mg overnight dexamethasone test did not suppress cortisol; a paradoxical increase in UFC was noted.
Revealed a 17q24.2 deletion in the sister that was not present in the parents.
